HEAD-META-TAGS.DESCRIPTION: A Minecraft mapart schematic and map.dat generator

DESCRIPTION.1: A Minecraft mapart schematic and map.dat generator, designed to be feasible for both server admins and survival players on servers like
DESCRIPTION.5: , with the goal to add much-requested features and removing the need to download a program.
DESCRIPTION.6: This is a fork of the original
DESCRIPTION.7: by rebane2001. Feature requests and bug reports go on

PRESETS.TITLE: Presets
PRESETS.DELETE-CONFIRM: Would you like to delete this preset:
PRESETS.DELETE-ERROR-DEFAULT: This is a default preset and can't be edited/deleted.
PRESETS.SAVE-PROMPT-ENTER-NAME: Enter a name for your preset:
PRESETS.SHARE-TT: Shares the blocks you have currently selected as a link
PRESETS.SHARE-LINK: Copy this link to share your currently selected blocks
PRESETS.DOWNLOAD-TT: Downloads color palette for use in Paint.NET
PRESETS.DOWNLOAD-WARNING-MAX-COLOURS-2: colors, while the maximum in Paint.NET is 96. Some colors will be unavailable in Paint.NET

ADD-CUSTOM.TITLE: Add Custom
ADD-CUSTOM.NO-EXPORT: Note: Custom blocks will not be exported.

MAP-PREVIEW.TITLE: Map preview
MAP-PREVIEW.BEST-RESOLUTION-TT: A source image with this resolution will work the best
MAP-PREVIEW.ASPECT-RATIO-MISMATCH-TT: Image doesn't match map's aspect ratio

MAP-SETTINGS.TITLE: Settings
MAP-SETTINGS.MODE-TT: Select the mode you'd like to operate in
MAP-SETTINGS.VERSION-TT: Select the version closest to what you're running

CROP.TITLE: Crop
CROP.TITLE-TT: Crops your image instead of stretching it out

MAP-SETTINGS.GRID-OVERLAY-TT: Overlays a grid that shows 16x16 chunks and 1x1 splits

3D.TITLE: Staircasing
3D.TITLE-TT: Makes the map 3D. Harder to build, but 3 times the colors!

MAPDAT-SPECIFIC.UNOBTAINABLE-COLOURS-TT: Enables map.dat colors unobtainiable in schematics

DITHERING.TITLE: Dithering
DITHERING.TITLE-TT: Adds seemingly random pixels for the illusion of more colors

NBT-SPECIFIC.DOWNLOAD-SPLIT-TT: Download the nbt split into 1x1 chunks

MAPDAT-SPECIFIC.DOWNLOAD-TT: Download the map.dat split into 1x1 chunks

MATERIALS.TITLE: Materials
MATERIALS.SHOW-PER-SPLIT: Only show max mats per map split
MATERIALS.SHOW-PER-SPLIT-TT: For material reuse with locked maps
MATERIALS.SHOW-PER-LAYER: Only show mats per staggered layer

VIEW-ONLINE.TITLE: VIEW ONLINE
VIEW-ONLINE.TITLE-TT: View the schematic online without downloading
VIEW-ONLINE.TOO-BIG-FOR-SINGLE: Too big for single schematic; download 1x1 split

LITEMATICA-WARNING: Warning, Litematica does not support 1.15.2 very well; recommended action is to update to 1.16.5
EDGE-WARNING: Note: using Microsoft Edge is unsupported.\nPlease use Chrome (preferred) or Firefox for MapartCraft
